<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	PRELIMINARY PROSPECTUS
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/21/0001193125-17-049550_G337825G22T57.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="5">
<B>
	5,000,000 Shares
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="6">
<B>
	The Trade Desk,&nbsp;Inc.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="5">
<B>
	Class&nbsp;A Common Stock
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="5">
<B>
	$&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;per share
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<CENTER>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000;WIDTH:15%">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</CENTER>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The selling stockholders named in this prospectus are selling up to 5,000,000 shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock. We will not receive any
	proceeds from the sale of any shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock by the selling stockholders. The public offering price is $&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;per share of Class&nbsp;A common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We have two classes of authorized common stock, Class&nbsp;A
	common stock and Class&nbsp;B common stock. The rights of the holders of Class&nbsp;A common stock and Class&nbsp;B common stock are identical, except for voting and conversion rights. Each share of Class&nbsp;A common stock is entitled to one vote.
	Each share of Class&nbsp;B common stock is entitled to ten votes and is convertible at any time into one share of Class&nbsp;A common stock. Following this offering, outstanding shares of Class&nbsp;B common stock will represent approximately 94% of
	the voting power of our outstanding capital stock, and outstanding shares of common stock held by our executive officers, directors and holders of more than 5% of our capital stock will represent approximately 78% of the voting power of our
	outstanding capital stock, assuming, in each case, no exercise by the underwriters of their option to purchase additional shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our Class&nbsp;A common stock is listed on The NASDAQ Global Market under the symbol &#147;TTD&#148;. The last reported sale of our Class
	A common stock on The NASDAQ Global Market on February 17, 2017 was $32.41.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We are an &#147;emerging growth company&#148; as defined under federal securities laws and, as such, have elected to comply with certain reduced public company reporting requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<CENTER>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000;WIDTH:15%">

	risks. See &#147;

	The selling stockholders
	have granted the underwriters the option to purchase up to an additional 750,000 shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock at the public offering price, less the underwriting discount.

<A NAME="eolPage3"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/21/0001193125-17-049550_G337825PG1.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	A clearer view of digital advertising Precision bidding across display, video, mobile, native, audio and TV $202M $20.5M $65.2M
	2016 Revenue 2016 Net Income 2016 Adj. EBITDA* 78% 2016 YoY Revenue Growth &gt;95% 2016 Client Retention Through MSAs Experience true buying power with theTradeDesk *For information on how we compute Adjusted EBITDA and reconciliation of Adjusted
	EBITDA to net income see &#147;Selected Consolidated Financial Data.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage4"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/21/0001193125-17-049550_G337825PG2.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	Advertisers need to value impressions just like traders value stocks. Every day, media is becoming more fragmented as old models
	are reinvented digitally&#151; from newspapers to TV&#151; making it harder for advertisers to reach their audience. This new landscape requires powerful technology and unbiased partners to help marketers carefully decide which ads to buy and which
	to avoid in every channel. Armed with customer profile and path to purchase insights only digital media can provide, ad buying can now be informed by data to make decisions, valuing each impression like traders value stocks. One of the biggest
	issues in advertising has been price discovery, and if there&#146;s anything we&#146;ve learned from financial markets in the last 10 years, it&#146;s that you cannot have a healthy market without price discovery. This requires having good data and
	metrics. Only then, when you know what you&#146;re buying and can measure the real impact that any given ad placement can have, do we see price discovery. In addition to optimizing each individual ad selection, marketers must also adopt holistic,
	multi-channel media buying strategies across the open Internet ecosystem. Too often, digital media buying happens through multiple, uncoordinated specialty shops. Marketers who execute and optimize campaigns in a single platform across all channels
	and devices are suddenly empowered to gauge effectiveness by the strenght of their connection with the audience and business results, instead of relying on decades-old, crude metrics like the number of people reached. Experience true buying power
	with theTradeDesk
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2017/02/21/0001193125-17-049550_G337825PG3.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:0.5PT">
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">
	This is a platform that can be tailored to meet the needs of power users and newcomers alike. The Forrester WaveTM Demand-Side
	Platforms, Q2 2015 Experience true buying power with theTradeDesk
</FONT>
</P>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	i

<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
</EFX_TABLE_OF_CONTENTS>
<EFX_PROSPECTUS_SUMMARY>
<A NAME="FIS_PROSPECTUS_SUMMARY"></A>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<A NAME="D337825DS1A_HTM_ROM337825_1">
</A>
	SUMMARY
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<I>
	This summary highlights selected information that is
	presented in greater detail elsewhere in this prospectus. This summary does not contain all of the information you should consider before investing in our Class&nbsp;A common stock. You should read this entire prospectus carefully, including the
	sections titled &#147;Risk Factors&#148; and &#147;Management&#146;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations,&#148; and our consolidated financial statements and the related notes included elsewhere in this
	prospectus before making an investment decision. Unless the context otherwise requires, the terms &#147;The Trade Desk,&#148; &#147;the Company,&#148; &#147;we,&#148; &#147;us&#148; and &#147;our&#148; refer to The Trade Desk,&nbsp;Inc. and its
	consolidated subsidiaries.
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Our Company
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our company provides a technology platform
	for ad buyers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	With our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-serve
</FONT>
	platform, ad buyers are able to share their customized messages and ideas with the people and in the context they deliberately choose.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our mission is to help our clients compete in the
	marketplace of ideas&#151;the place in media and public discourse where ideas and messages compete in the open market for the mindshare of men and women around the world. Since most traditional and digital media is primarily monetized with
	advertising, ads are the currency of media and the Internet, and therefore at the center of the marketplace of ideas.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our platform makes media monetization more effective. Instead of disrupting the foundation of media and advertising, we enable it. By
	offering compelling improvements in effectiveness, efficiency and reporting, we aim to change media and advertising globally.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our platform makes it possible to message specific ideas to specific people. We give advertisers of all sizes the power to have
	simultaneous
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1-to-1
</FONT>
</FONT>
	customized interactions with billions of people around the world. Most advertising dollars are spent on awareness, where a brand pushes new
	information and ideas to a broad audience. Conversely, search engines respond to specific requests from individuals for information. Our technology combines the best of both, making it possible to push out a precise idea or message to a targeted
	audience with global scale.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Founded by some of
	the pioneers of the programmatic ad market, we established our company in 2009 with the intent to make advertising better by deploying massive amounts of data. By providing ad buyers with tools to leverage their
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	first-party
</FONT>
	data as well as
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	third-party
</FONT>
	data, we aim to provide a higher return on every advertising dollar spent. While our technology platform is deployed to directly
	serve ad buyers, the entire advertising marketplace benefits&#151;publishers and content creators can experience a higher yield on their inventory, while consumers can receive advertising that is more relevant and interesting to them.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We believe that an average consumer
	might be exposed to over one&nbsp;thousand digital advertisements on a typical day. Most consumers are unaware that when they land on a webpage, watch a video, use a mobile app or watch an
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Internet-connected
</FONT>
	TV, there is often an auction for advertising inventory being run in about 1/10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;of one second behind the scenes as the content loads. Our platform provides access to approximately 4.7&nbsp;million ad spots on average every second for our clients to bid on across millions of
	different scaled media sources&#151;websites, shows, channels, stations and streams. Our technology makes it possible for ad buyers to compete in those
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-time
</FONT>
	auctions. Our platform helps our clients
	determine what ad will display and what price they should pay for every ad opportunity a buyer can consider.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In 2016, approximately $651.7&nbsp;billion was spent on global advertising (including approximately $225.4&nbsp;billion on TV advertising
	and approximately $54.6&nbsp;billion on display advertising), according to International Data Corporation, or IDC, and in 2016, approximately $19&nbsp;billion was transacted in the programmatic advertising spot market via
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-time
</FONT>
	marketplaces, according to Magna Global. We aim to power every agent of every advertiser in both the spot and forward markets, including upfront purchases, for programmatic advertising.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We also believe that the efficiency of programmatic advertising will lead to a greater
	percentage of every advertising dollar ending up in the pocket of publishers. Publishers can now generate revenue without the large sales forces that were required in the past. Higher revenue yields and lower operating costs make it possible for
	publishers to increase their investment in creating high quality content.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Programmatic advertising is currently a small portion of total global advertising spend. Largely because of the price discovery benefits, we believe eventually the vast majority of advertising will be
	transacted programmatically.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We enable the
	programmatic marketplace with our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-serve
</FONT>
	platform. The unique architecture of our platform allows users access to highly granular targeting and reporting options, which we refer to as expressiveness. When
	combined with our data management capability and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	first-party
</FONT>
	data, our clients can reach their highly specified audiences with customized messages and generate favorable campaign outcomes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	By using our technology and the reach of the Internet, we
	can power this
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	data-driven
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1-to-1
</FONT>
</FONT>
	messaging with massive global scale. We believe in order to do this effectively, we have to be
	a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	buy-side
</FONT>
	only platform across a spectrum of media, which we refer to as omnichannel. As the biggest brands desire to communicate with consumers worldwide, we have to be global, which is why we have employees
	and offices around the world.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We derive nearly
	all of our gross spend and revenue from ongoing master service agreements that give users constant access to our platform, instead of insertion orders, which typically are
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	one-off
</FONT>
	deals to run single
	campaigns.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We have grown faster than the
	programmatic market and have achieved significant revenue scale with $1.0&nbsp;billion in gross spend in 2016. Our revenue was $202.9&nbsp;million in 2016, representing a growth rate of 78% over $113.8&nbsp;million in 2015, while programmatic
	advertising spend in the industry grew to $19&nbsp;billion in 2016, according to Magna Global, representing a growth rate of over 27% from 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We generated net income of $15.9 million in 2015 and $20.5&nbsp;million in 2016. We generated Adjusted EBITDA of $39.2&nbsp;million in
	2015 and $65.2&nbsp;million in 2016. Adjusted EBITDA is a financial measure not presented in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, or GAAP. For a definition of Adjusted EBITDA, an explanation of our management&#146;s use of this
	measure and a reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA to net income, see footnote&nbsp;3 in the section captioned &#147;Selected Consolidated Financial Data&#148; included elsewhere in this prospectus. For additional financial information, see the audited
	consolidated financial statements and related notes included elsewhere in this prospectus.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Our Industry
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Since the introduction of
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	ad-funded
</FONT>
	television in the middle of the 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;century and continuing through the present day, most advertising inventory has been transacted based on a rate
	card. Publishers, content owners, and their agents set a price for their inventory, and buyers place an order to purchase that inventory. Similar to how the equities and commodities markets have transitioned from paper transactions on trading floors
	to electronic trading, advertising is transitioning from manual to programmatic.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Several trends, happening in parallel, are revolutionizing the way that advertising is bought and sold. The rise of the Internet has led to a wholesale change in the way that media is consumed and
	monetized, as ads can be digitally delivered on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	1-to-1
</FONT>
</FONT>
	basis. In traditional methods of advertising, such as broadcast TV, ads can target a specific network, program
	or geography, but not a single household or individual as digital ads can.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Some of the key industry trends are:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Media is Becoming Digital.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Media is increasingly becoming digital as a result of advances in technology and changes in consumer behavior. This shift has enabled
	unprecedented options for advertisers to target and measure their advertising campaigns across nearly every media channel and device. The digital advertising market is a significant and growing part of the total advertising market. According to IDC,
	global advertising
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	spend was approximately $651.7&nbsp;billion in 2016 and is expected to grow to $767.1&nbsp;billion in 2020, a compound annual growth rate of 4.2%. Also according to IDC, global digital
	advertising spend was $205.4&nbsp;billion in 2016 and is expected to grow to $339.9&nbsp;billion in 2020, a compound annual growth rate of 13.4%. We believe that the market is evolving and that advertisers will shift more spend to digital media.
	Since media is becoming increasingly digital, decisions based on consumer and behavioral data are more prevalent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Fragmentation of Audience.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As digital media grows, audience fragmentation is accelerating. A growing
	&#147;long tail&#148; of websites and content presents a challenge for advertisers trying to reach a large audience. Audience fragmentation has substantially impacted TV content distribution, perhaps more than any other channel, which we believe is
	setting up a significant change in how TV advertising inventory is monetized. Mirroring the fragmentation occurring in content, the number of devices used by individual consumers has increased. Both of these fragmentation trends are opportunities
	for technology companies that can consolidate and simplify media buying options for advertisers and their agencies.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Shift to Programmatic Advertising.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that the advertising industry is in the early stages of
	a shift to programmatic advertising, which is the ability to buy and sell advertising inventory electronically. Initially available for digital display advertising and transacted through
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-time
</FONT>
	bidding
	platforms, programmatic advertising has evolved and is increasingly being used to transact across a wide range of advertising inventory, including display, mobile, video and audio among other inventory types, including TV.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We believe that TV advertising is just beginning its
	transition to programmatic. According to IDC research sponsored by our company, programmatic TV advertising spend is projected to grow from $239.8&nbsp;million in 2015 to $17.3&nbsp;billion in 2019.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Automation of Ad
	Buying.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The growing complexity of digital advertising has increased the need for automation. Technology that enables fast, accurate and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	cost-effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	decision-making
</FONT>
	through the application of computer algorithms that use extensive data sets has become critical for the success of digital advertising campaigns. Using programmatic inventory buying tools,
	advertisers are able to automate their campaigns, providing them with better price discovery, on an impression by impression basis. As a result, advertisers are able to purchase the advertising inventory they value the most, pay less for advertising
	inventory they do not value as much, and abstain from buying advertising inventory that does not fit their campaign parameters. Most of the growth in programmatic advertising to date has been driven by transactions on spot markets on advertising
	exchanges. Forward advertising markets and upfront purchases, which have traditionally been delivered manually, are also beginning to be handled programmatically.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Increased Use of
	Data.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Advances in software and hardware and the growing use of the Internet have made it possible to collect and rapidly process massive amounts of user data. Data vendors are able to collect user information across a
	wide range of Internet properties and connected devices, aggregate it and combine it with other data sources. This data is then made
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	non-identifiable
</FONT>
	and available within seconds based on specific parameters
	and attributes. Advertisers can integrate this targeting data with their own or an agency&#146;s proprietary data relating to client attributes, the advertisers&#146; own store locations and other related characteristics. Through the use of these
	data sources, together with
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-time
</FONT>
	feedback on consumer reactions to the ads, programmatic advertising increases the value of impressions for advertisers, inventory owners and viewers who receive more
	relevant ads.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Driven by these industry trends,
	programmatic advertising is expected to grow from $19&nbsp;billion during 2016 to $42&nbsp;billion by 2020, according to Magna Global. We believe that programmatic advertising will continue to grow as more content providers, content distributors and
	advertisers are able to realize its benefits. In addition, we expect that programmatic advertising will help grow the overall advertising market by enabling more advertisers to deploy more spend across a broader range of inventory channels.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	What We Do
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We are a technology company that empowers advertising
	agencies to purchase advertising more efficiently and effectively. We provide an intuitive
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-serve
</FONT>
	platform that enables our clients to manage
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	data-driven,
</FONT>
	digital
	advertising campaigns using their own teams.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are an Enabler, Not a Disruptor.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	With our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-serve
</FONT>
	platform, we enable
	advertising agencies and service providers. We do not compete with our clients by selling our platform directly to their advertisers. Our
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-service
</FONT>
	technology platform provides control to our clients and
	gives us the benefits of a highly scalable business model.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are Exclusively Focused on the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Buy-Side.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
	We focus on buyers since they control the
	advertising budgets. Also, the supply of digital advertising inventory exceeds demand, and accordingly we believe it is a buyer&#146;s market. We also believe that by aligning our business only with buyers, we are able to avoid inherent conflicts of
	interest that exist when serving both the
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	buy-
</FONT>
	and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	sell-side.
</FONT>
	This focus allows us to build trust with clients, many of whom incorporate their proprietary data into our
	platform.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Data-Driven.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
	Our technology platform was founded on the principle that
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	data-driven
</FONT>
	decisions would be the future of advertising. We built a data management platform first, before building our ad buying technology. While data from disparate
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	third-party
</FONT>
	data providers can improve campaign performance, our clients&#146; success often relies largely on our ability to ingest
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	first-party
</FONT>
	data from brands and
	their agencies to enable intelligent decisioning that optimizes advertising campaigns.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Do Not Arbitrage Advertising Inventory.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	To further align our interests with those of our clients, we do not buy advertising
	inventory in order to resell it to our clients for a profit. Instead, we provide our clients with a technology platform that allows them to manage their omnichannel advertising campaigns, on a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-serve
</FONT>
	basis
	and with full transparency. We derive substantially all of our revenue from ongoing master service agreements with our clients rather than episodic insertion orders.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are a Clear Box, Not a Black Box.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Our platform is transparent and shows our clients their costs of advertising inventory,
	data, our platform fee and detailed performance metrics on their advertising campaigns. Our clients directly access and execute campaigns on our platform, control all facets of inventory purchasing decisions, and receive detailed,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	real-time
</FONT>
	reporting on all their advertising campaigns.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are an Open Platform.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Clients can customize and build their own features on top of our platform. Clients may use our
	application programming interfaces, or APIs, to, for example, design their own user interface, bulk manage advertising campaigns, and link other systems including ad servers or reporting tools. As of December&nbsp;31, 2016, all of our top 10 clients
	used our APIs.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We Are Omnichannel.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Our platform enables our clients to deliver unified advertising campaigns across multiple devices,
	including computers, smartphones, tablets, gaming consoles, digital TV and broadcast TV. We also support multiple formats, including display, video, broadcast TV,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Internet-connected
</FONT>
	TV, mobile web,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	in-app
</FONT>
	mobile and native. The breadth of data that we collect from a multitude of data sources across all channels gives our clients a holistic view of audiences, enabling more effective targeting across different
	channels.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Our Strengths
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We believe the following attributes and
	capabilities form our core strengths and provide us with competitive advantages:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Expressiveness of Our Platform.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Our platform allows clients to easily define and manage advertising campaigns with multiple
	targeting parameters that may result in quadrillions of permutations, which we refer to as expressiveness. We believe that expressiveness provides clients with the ability to target audiences with an extremely high level of precision and thus obtain
	higher returns on their advertising spend.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>

<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Scalable
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	Self-Service
</FONT>
	Model.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	We offer a
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	self-service
</FONT>
	model that lets clients direct their own purchases of advertising inventory without extensive involvement by our personnel. This model helps us scale efficiently and has allowed us to grow our
	business at a faster pace than the growth of our sales and support organization.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Loyal Client Base.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	We had approximately 566 clients, including the advertising industry&#146;s largest agencies, as of
	December&nbsp;31, 2016. Many of our clients use our platform regularly as part of their digital advertising purchase workflow, creating ongoing relationships. As a result, our clients are loyal, with over 95% client retention during 2015 and 2016.
	In addition, our clients typically grow their use of our platform over time, with our clients who spent with us in 2015 increasing their spend on our platform by 71% during 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Extensive Data Access.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Our clients can easily buy targeting data from over 105 sources through our platform. We also provide
	clients access to our proprietary data, which increases with continued use of our platform. We believe that the integration of data and decisioning within a single platform enables us to better serve our clients.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Focus on Innovation.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	Our focus on innovation enables us to enhance our platform rapidly for our clients in a constantly
	evolving industry. We have designed the technology for our platform to enable us to develop new features and make changes quickly and efficiently. For example, we enhanced our platform with 47 releases of updated features and increased functionality
	in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	Scaled and Profitable Business Model.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
	We have grown our business rapidly while achieving profitability, demonstrating the
	power of our platform, the strength of our client relationships and the leverage inherent to our business model. During 2016, gross spend was $1.0&nbsp;billion, helping us generate $202.9&nbsp;million in revenue, up 78% from 2015. In 2016, our net
	income was $20.5&nbsp;million and our Adjusted EBITDA increased by 67% to $65.2&nbsp;million. See footnote&nbsp;3 in the section captioned &#147;Selected Consolidated Financial Data&#148; included elsewhere in this prospectus.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	Our business is subject to numerous risks and uncertainties, including those in the section captioned &#147;Risk Factors&#148; beginning
	on page&nbsp;11 and elsewhere in this prospectus. These risks include, but are not limited to, the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">

	investment;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	our failure to innovate and make the right investment decisions in our offerings and platform, which could compromise our ability to attract and retain
	advertisers and advertising agencies, and cause our revenue and results of operations to decline;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	if the market for programmatic advertising, which is relatively new and evolving, develops slower or differently than we expect, our business, growth
	prospects and financial condition would be adversely affected;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	we have identified material weaknesses in our internal control over financial reporting and, if our remediation of these material weaknesses is not
	effective, or if we fail to maintain an effective system of internal control over financial reporting in the future, we may not be able to accurately or timely report our financial condition or results of operations, which may adversely affect
	investor confidence in us and the price of our common stock;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	insiders will continue to have substantial control over our company after this offering, including as a result of the dual class structure of our
	common stock, which could limit your ability to influence the outcome of key decisions, including a change of control;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	our sales cycle can take significant time before executing a client agreement, which may make it difficult to project when, if at all, we will obtain
	new clients and when we will generate revenue from those clients;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	we are subject to payment-related risks and, if our clients do not pay or dispute their invoices, our business, financial condition and operating
	results may be adversely affected;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	because our business is primarily dependent on advertisers purchasing display advertising, a decrease in the use of display advertising would harm our
	business, growth prospects, financial condition and results of operations; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

</TD>

	if our access to quality advertising inventory is diminished, our revenue could decline and our growth could be impeded.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Corporate Information
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We were incorporated in Delaware in November 2009. Our
	principal executive offices are located at 42 N. Chestnut Street, Ventura, California 93001, and our telephone number is (805)&nbsp;585-3434. Our website address is www.thetradedesk.com. The information on, or that can be accessed through, our
	website is not incorporated by reference into this prospectus, and you should not consider any such information as part of this prospectus or when deciding whether to purchase our Class&nbsp;A common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX; ">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Trade Desk and our other registered
	or common law trademarks, service marks or trade names appearing in this prospectus are the property of The Trade Desk,&nbsp;Inc. Other trademarks, service marks or trade names appearing in this prospectus are the property of their respective
	owners. We have omitted the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	and &#153; designations, as applicable, for the trademarks used in this
	prospectus.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Implications of Being an Emerging
	Growth Company
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Jumpstart Our Business
	Startups Act, or the JOBS Act, was enacted in April 2012 with the intention of encouraging capital formation in the United States and reducing the regulatory burden on newly public companies that qualify as &#147;emerging growth companies.&#148; We
	are an emerging growth company within the meaning of the JOBS Act. As an emerging growth company, we may take advantage of certain exemptions from
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D337825DS1A_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<DIV STYLE ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0PX;MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX;WIDTH:100%">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:97%; MARGIN-TOP:1.5%; MARGIN-LEFT:1.5%; MARGIN-RIGHT:-1.25%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	various public reporting requirements, including the requirement that our internal control over financial reporting be audited by our independent registered public accounting firm pursuant to
	Section&nbsp;404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, certain requirements related to the disclosure of executive compensation in this prospectus and in our periodic reports and proxy statements, and the requirement that we hold a non-binding advisory
	vote on executive compensation and any golden parachute payments. We may take advantage of these exemptions until we are no longer an emerging growth company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We will remain an emerging growth company until the earliest to occur of: (1)&nbsp;the last day of the fiscal year in which we have
	$1.0&nbsp;billion or more in annual gross revenue; (2)&nbsp;the date we qualify as a &#147;large accelerated filer&#148; with, among other things, at least $700&nbsp;million of equity securities held by non-affiliates; (3)&nbsp;the date on which we
	have issued, in any three-year period, more than $1.0&nbsp;billion in non-convertible debt securities; and (4)&nbsp;the last day of the fiscal year ending after the fifth anniversary of our initial public offering, or our IPO, which was completed in
	September 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For certain risks related to our
	status as an emerging growth company, see the section captioned &#147;Risk Factors&#148; beginning on page&nbsp;12.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_5"></A>

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We will not receive any proceeds from the sale of shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock by the selling stockholders.
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="38%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:1PX; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; TEXT-INDENT:-2%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Voting Rights
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock are entitled to one vote per share. Shares of Class&nbsp;B common stock are entitled to ten votes per share. Holders of our Class&nbsp;A common stock and
	Class&nbsp;B common stock generally vote together as a single class, unless otherwise required by law.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Assuming no exercise of the underwriters&#146; option to purchase additional shares, following this offering, outstanding shares of Class&nbsp;B common stock will
	represent approximately 94% of the voting power of our outstanding capital stock, and outstanding shares of common stock held by our executive officers, directors and holders of more than 5% of our capital stock will represent approximately 78% of
	the voting power of our outstanding capital stock.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	24,060,210 shares of our Class&nbsp;B common stock, and excludes, in each case as of December&nbsp;31, 2016:

	Plan, or our 2010 Plan, and The Trade Desk, Inc. 2015 Equity Incentive Plan, or our 2015 Plan, with a weighted-average exercise price of approximately $3.03 per share; and 389,369 shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock issuable upon the exercise of
	outstanding options under our 2016 Equity Incentive Plan, or our 2016 Plan, with a weighted-average exercise price of approximately $29.65 per share;

</A>
</H5>

	Except as otherwise indicated, all information in this prospectus reflects where applicable, a 1-for-3 reverse stock split of our common
	stock and a proportional adjustment to the conversion ratio of our convertible preferred stock, which was effected on September&nbsp;2, 2016, and assumes no exercise of outstanding options to purchase common stock after December&nbsp;31, 2016 and no
	exercise of the underwriters&#146; option to purchase additional shares. We have assumed that all of the shares of Class A common stock to be sold in this offering will be issued at closing upon the conversion of outstanding shares of Class B common
	stock.
</FONT>

<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>
<A NAME="FIS_RISK_FACTORS_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<A NAME="D337825DS1A_HTM_ROM337825_2">
</A>
	RISK FACTORS
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<I>
	Investing in our Class&nbsp;A common stock involves a
	high degree of risk. You should consider carefully the risks and uncertainties described below, together with all of the other information in this prospectus, including the consolidated financial statements and the related notes, before deciding
	whether to purchase shares of our Class&nbsp;A common stock. The risks and uncertainties described below include those that we consider material and that we are currently aware of, but are not the only ones we face. If any of the following risks is
	realized, our business, financial condition, results of operation and prospects could be materially and adversely affected. In that event, the market price of our Class&nbsp;A common stock could decline and you could lose part or all of your
	investment.
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Risks Related to Our Business and Industry
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	We have a limited operating history, which makes it
	difficult to evaluate our business and prospects and may increase the risks associated with your investment.
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We were incorporated in 2009 and, as a result, have only a limited operating history upon which our business and prospects may be
	evaluated. Although we have experienced substantial revenue growth in our limited operating history, we may not be able to sustain this rate of growth or maintain our current revenue levels. We have encountered and will continue to encounter risks
	and challenges frequently experienced by growing companies in rapidly developing industries, including risks related to our ability to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	build a reputation for providing a superior platform and client service, and for creating trust and
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	long-term
</FONT>
	relationships with clients;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR STYLE = "PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE:AVOID">

	&nbsp;

	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	distinguish ourselves from competitors;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-6PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
